mapper.update: update user set user_bg = #{userBg} where user_no = #{userNo}

insert into user(user_email, user_name, user_password, user_number, user_birth, user_title, user_dept, user_photo, user_bg, user_key) values (#{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{password}, null, null, null, null, "img.png", null, null);

mapper.update: update user set user_key = #{userKey} where user_no = #{userNo}
